General.Name: OceanPact Serviços Marítimos S.A
General.Description: OceanPact Serviços Marítimos S.A. provides services related to the study, protection, monitoring, and sustainable use of the sea, coastline, and marine resources in Brazil and internationally. It operates through two segments, vessels and services. The company provides environmental services, such as environmental protection, oceanographic surveys, environmental licensing and studies, operational safety, and environmental remediation; subsea services, including geophysics, geotechnics, inspection, repair, and maintenance services, as well as support services for construction and decommissioning activities; and logistics and engineering services comprising maritime logistics, offshore support base, port and coastal engineering, construction and dredging, and facilities and industrial cleaning. It primarily serves the oil and gas sector, as well as other sectors, such as ports, shipping, mining, energy, and telecommunications. OceanPact Serviços Marítimos S.A. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua da Glória, 122, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 20241-180
